For someone who enjoys folklore and action, I recommend watching 'The Relic' (2017). The film combines elements of folklore with a thrilling storyline involving a South American lizard-like god causing chaos in Chicago. 

Alternatively, if you're a fan of the superhero genre, 'The Amazing Spider-Man' (2012) is a great choice. It tells the story of Peter Parker's transformation into Spider-Man after being bitten by a genetically altered spider. With impressive action sequences and performances from actors like Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, this film offers a thrilling Spider-Man adventure.
